item.description:
Angkor is advertised as a Cambodian restaurant, but like most Asian restaurants in Providence it's really pan-Asian. Entrees are $7.99 and up.

I think the food is pretty yummy, but the service is excellent, and best of all it's BYOB! Don't forget to bring your favorite bottle of beer or wine...

I've managed to reserve most of the upstairs room for our group.

We can also decide after dinner if we would like to move on to something else [either a bar or the movies or bowling or whatever] afterwards, but again, we don't have to either.

Please RSVP by 2pm 8/2.

Email me at malyna@gmail.com if you would like my cell phone number.
item.how_to_find_us: Reservations will be under "Meetup" - We'll be upstairs
item.name: Angkor Restaurant - Dinner and...?
